name: market for carbon monoxide | carbon monoxide | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11121/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'carbon monoxide', in the geography of Europe.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;carbon monoxide'  is an inorganic substance with a CAS no. : 000630-08-0. It is called 'carbon monoxide' under IUPAC naming and its molecular formula is: CO. It is gas under normal conditions of temperature and pressure with no distinct odour. It is modelled as a pure substance. On a consumer level, is used in the following products: laboratory chemicals, fuels, metal surface treatment products, polymers and semiconductors. There is no publicly available information about the consumption of this substance on industrial sites.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'carbon monoxide',  within the geography of Europe.

This activity ends with the supply of 'carbon monoxide',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
